               throws DatabaseException
        Insert a new user into the database
        Parameters:
        username - the new user's name
        lastName - the new user's last name
        firstName - the new user's first name
        email - the new user's mail address
        password - the new user's password

        Parameters:
        username - the user's name
        Returns:
        the id linked to the given user's name
        Throws:

        ValueNotFoundException - if the user is not in the database
